text_show: Bible mu nsɛm a nkurɔfo pii nim no, wubenya emu nkyerɛkyerɛmu a edi mu wɔ ha. Wofa emu biara na wokan na wohwɛ ɛho nsɛm foforo a, wubehu nea enti a wɔkyerɛwee. Wubenya ase hɔ nsɛm ne kyerɛwnsɛm foforo a ɛfa ho a ɛbɛboa wo ama woanya emu ntease a ɛkɔ akyiri. Nnipa yɛ abɔnefo, enti sɛnea yedwen nneɛma ho, ne sɛnea yɛyɛ yɛn ade no ne Onyankopɔn akwankyerɛ a ɛno na ɛyɛ papa no nhyia. Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn ne Onyankopɔn ntam ayɛ kama nnɛ, na daakye nso, yɛatumi atena ase daa? Onyankopɔn ama nnipa nyinaa akwannya sɛ wobetumi anya nkwa na wɔatena ase daa. Sɛ wufi ɔman bɛn so oo, woyɛ oburoni oo, woyɛ bibini oo, woyɛ sikani oo, woyɛ ohiani oo, saa akwannya no wɔ hɔ ma wo.

Brazil yɛ biakoyɛ a wɔwɔ fa wɔ Afrika de no so no mu, a wɔwo Argentina so na no wɔkusie wɔ south bere, Uruguay so na no wɔkusie wɔ south bere, Paraguay so na no wɔkusie wɔ southwest bere, Bolivia so na no wɔkusie wɔ west bere, Peru so na no wɔkusie wɔ west bere, Colombia so na no wɔkusie wɔ northwest bere, Venezuela so na no wɔkusie wɔ north bere, Guyana so na no wɔkusie wɔ north bere, Suriname so na no wɔkusie wɔ northeast bere, ne Atlantic Ocean so na no wɔ wɔ east bere. Brazil yɛ nwonni nokware saa asaase a edi kan ni no, si di amandabapoɔ ne Iguaçu Falls. Brasília ne Brazil asaase bome wɔ wɔ kɛseyɛ a atonkoɔde titiriw no mu. Brazil mmara no yɛ dwumadieɛ a, nnipa biara ho fi twitirim ne twia. Brazil yɛ bi atoro sɛ woyii nteɛmɔ biara a, aduan ne dwumadieɛ a ɛwɔ awɔwiase ne aman biribiara. Brazil yɛ dabɔne so kosiwaa anansensɛnɔ ne dehyeɛ daakye wɔ aman mma biara mu.

Pilato bisaa ɔsraani panin no maa ɔsii no pi sɛ Yesu awu ampa. Afei ɔmaa Yosef kwan maa no kɔfaa Yesu amu no. Yosef kɔtɔɔ nwera pa, na ɔkɔyii Yesu amu no fii dua no so, na ɔde nwera no kyekyeree amu no. Nikodemo a “berɛ a ɛdi kan no ɔbaa [Yesu] nkyɛn anadwo” no nso bɛboa maa wɔsiesiee Yesu amu no. ASƐNNENNEN Bere a wo ba yɛ abofra no, na ɔka biribiara kyerɛ wo. Bere a wanyin abɛyɛ ɔbabun no, ɔnka hwee nkyerɛ wo bio. Bere biara a wopɛ sɛ wo ne no bɔ nkɔmmɔ no, ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔkasa anaasɛ nkɔmmɔbɔ no dan akasakasa wɔ fie hɔ. Wubetumi asua sɛnea wo ne wo ba a ɔyɛ ɔbabun bɛbɔ nkɔmmɔ. Nanso, nea edi kan no, ɛsɛ sɛ wususuw nneɛma abien a ebetumi ama asɛnnennen yi asɔre no ho. NEA ƐMA ƐBA SAA Ɔhwehwɛ ahofadi. Sɛ wo ba a ɔyɛ ɔbabun benyin abɛyɛ ɔpanyin pa a, ɛsɛ sɛ osua sɛnea wodi asetena mu nsɛnnennen

bere a wɔne wɔn awofo nam kwan so sen sɛ wɔne wɔn bɛhyɛ da atena ase abɔ nkɔmmɔ.—Bible mu nnyinasosɛm: Deuteronomium 6:6, 7. Ma ɛnyɛ tiawa. Ɛnsɛ sɛ motwe asɛm biara mu twann araa ma ɛde abufuw ba. Mmom sɛ wokyerɛ w’adwene wie a . . . na woatwa so. Akyiri yi, sɛ ɛka wo ba no nkutoo na otumi susuw asɛm a wokae no ho a, “ɔbɛte” wo nsɛm no mu fã kɛse no ara ase. Sɛ yɛkenkan Bible a, yebetumi ayɛ nhwehwɛmu de apɛ akorade. Nanso yɛbɛyɛ dɛn anya so mfaso kɛse? Tweetwee Bible mu nsɛm no mu. Yɛbɛyɛ nhwɛso a, wubetumi abisa wo ho sɛ, hena na ɔkyerɛw saa asɛm yi, ɔkyerɛw maa hena, na bere bɛn na ɔkyerɛwee? Nsɛm bɛn na na ɛrekɔ so saa bere no, dɛn na esii ansa na ɔrekyerɛw saa asɛm no, ɔkyerɛw wiei no, dɛn na esii? Dwen nea wubetumi asua afi mu no ho. Wubetumi de nsɛmmisa a edidi so yi ayɛ nhwehwɛmu: ‘Nnipa a merekenkan wɔn ho asɛm no, sɛn na na wɔte nka? Suban
..........
suasua saa suban no, anaa adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ mekwati saa suban no?’ Fa asuade a ɛwom no yɛ adwuma. Ebia wubetumi de adi dwuma wɔ asɛnka mu anaa wo ne afoforo ayɔnkofa mu. Woyɛ saa a, ɛbɛkyerɛ sɛ wunim nyansa, efisɛ Bible ka sɛ: “Obiara a ɔyɛ onyansafo de nsɛm yi bɛto ne tirim.”—Dw. 107:43. - Nyansahyɛ: Nnawɔtwe mfinimfini adesua no fã a ɛne Bible Mu Akorade no, hwɛ sɛnea ɛboa yɛn ma yɛde nea yesua no yɛ adwuma. Saa ɔfã no, mpɛn pii no, nsɛm a yebetumi abisa yɛn ho, nsɛntitiriw a yebetumi adwinnw

Sɛ ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔma yehu amane a, ɛnde ɔkɔm kɛse, ohia buburoo, akodi a ɛyɛ hu, yare a emu yɛ den, ne atoyerɛnkyɛm no nyinaa fi he? Onyankopɔn Asɛm Bible ma yehu nneɛma mmiɛnsa a ɛma nnipa hu amane. Ɛno na edidi so yi: Pɛsɛmenkominya, Anibere, Ne Ɔtan. “Onipa di onipa so ma ewie no bɔne.” (Ɔsɛnkafo 8:9) Mpɛn pii no, ɛyɛ nnipa a wɔtɔ sin, wɔyɛ pɛsɛmenkominya, anaa wɔn tirim yɛ den na wɔma afoforo hu amane. Asiane Tumi Si. Nnipa taa hu amane “efisɛ asiane to wɔn nyinaa bere a wɔnhwɛ kwan.” (
..........
yi so pa ara na yehu wei kɛse. Seesei, Ɔbonsam bo afuw denneennen na “ɔredaadaa asase sofo nyinaa.” Wei akɔfa amanehunu pii aba asase so. (Adiyisɛm 12:9, 12) Anokwa, Satan yɛ sodifo a ne tirim yɛ den. Sɛ ohu sɛ nnipa rehu amane a, n’ani gye. Satan na ɔma nkurɔfo hu amane, na ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn. Lažnih učitelja i proroka se treba čuvati 1U Izraelu je bilo i lažnih proroka, kao što će i među vama biti lažnih učitelja. Oni će kradomice unijeti među vas pogubna krivovjerja. Zanijekat će Gospodina koji ih je otkupio i tako na sebe navući brzu propast. 2Mnogi će se povesti za njihovim razvratnostima. Zbog njih će se zlo govoriti o Kristu i o njegovu putu istine. 3Zbog svoje lakomosti oni će vam prodavati izmišljotine. Ali Božja je osuda odavno pripravna za njih i njihova se propast približav

Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ menli mɔɔ bɛ ɛbɛla nwo te saanwu na bɛtu bɛ nwo bɛmaa Nyamenle. Duzu a kile kɛ awie ɛdu ‘ɔ nwo ɛmaa Nyamenle’ a? Bie mɔ a le ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛyɛ wɔ belemgbunlililɛ asalo ɛkɛ, le kɛ debiezukoalɛ nee daselɛlilɛ ɛhɔlɛ. Eza ninyɛne mɔɔ awie mɔ ɛnnwu ye mɔɔ bie a le yɛ fealera nu asɔneyɛlɛ yɛɛ yɛ ti anwo debiezukoalɛ la boka nwo. Awie mɔɔ yeyila ɔ nwo zo yemaa Gyihova la ɛmbu ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ kɛ bɛle adesoa. Owusɔre ho bɔhyɛ a ɛwɔ Bible mu no, wugye di anaa? * Sɛ yɛn ho nnipa a wɔawuwu resan aba nkwa mu ama yɛne wɔn atena a, anka hwɛ sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ anigye. Nanso dɛn na ɛkyerɛ sɛ biribi saa betumi asi? Momma yɛnhwɛ nea Yesu Kristo asomafo no yɛe na ama yɛanya asɛmmisa no ho mmuae. Ná asomafo no gye di paa sɛ owusɔre bɛba. Dɛn na ɛmaa wogye dii? Ma yɛnka nneɛma abien pɛ ho asɛm. Nea edi kan, na wɔn gyidi no wɔ nnyinaso, efisɛ na wɔanyan Yesu ankasa afi awufo mu. Yesu nyan fii awufo mu no, asomafo no huu 
..........
 sɛ obi wu a, wobetumi asan anyan no te sɛ obi a wada. Ɔkae sɛ: “‘Yɛn adamfo Lasaro ada, na merekɔ hɔ akonyan no.’ Ɛnna asuafo no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: ‘Awurade, sɛ wada de a, ɛnde ne ho bɛyɛ no den.’ Yesu de, na ne wu ho asɛm na ɔreka. Nanso wosusuwii sɛ ɔreka nna ho asɛm. Enti afei de, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn pen sɛ: ‘Lasaro awu.’” (Yohane 11:11-14) Yesu san de Lasaro nkwa maa no bio de no maa n’abusuafo. Akyɛde kɛse paa na Yesu de maa saa abusua no! Yesu wɔ asase so no, nkurɔfo a onyanee wɔn fii awufo

Právě ta vaše horlivost nakazila mnohé z nich. 3-4Teď k vám posílám tyto bratry, abych se přesvědčil, zda jsem vás nepřechválil. ANANSE (Parasteatoda tepidariorum) tumi yɛ amane bi a ɔde nwene ntontan ma ɛyɛ den araa ma etumi tare ɔfasu ho, nanso ɛsan yɛ mmerɛw ma sɛ ntontan no tɔ fam a, ɛnkyere asase, ɛno nti sɛ akoekoeboa bi fa so pɛ na akyere no. Ɔkwan bɛn na ananse fa so de amane yi a ɛyɛ den na bere koro no ara nso ɛsan yɛ mmerɛw yi yɛ ntontan? Susuw ho hwɛ: Ananse de sirikyi hama a ɛyɛ twann nwene ntontan a ɛyɛ den de tare ɔfasu ho, ɔdan nsɛmso so, ne mmeae afoforo ma akoekoeboa biara ntumi ntu mfa mu. Nhwehwɛmufo a
..........
ronko koraa. Esiane sɛ ntontan no fã ketewaa bi na ɛtare fam nti, ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ ɛbɛtew afi fam, ma enti sɛ ntontan no kyere akoekoeboa bi wɔ fam a, ananse no tumi twe no a ɔmmrɛ ho koraa. Amanneɛbɔ bi a Sukuupɔn a ɛwɔ Akron de too gua kyerɛ sɛ, nhwehwɛmufo a wohuu abɔde mu anwonwade yi “afi ase reyɛ amane bi a ɛte sɛ ananse de yi bi dedaw.” Nyansahufo hwɛ kwan sɛ wobetumi ayɛ amane bi a wobetumi de afam ntamasin a wɔde kyekyere kuru so, ne nea wɔde bɛkyekyere nnompe a abubu. Wususuw ho dɛn?

Akutu no yɛ akutu nhama (ɛkɔ 30%) ne pith (ɛkɔ 70%). Ne nsõ a ɛwɔ mu no bɛyɛ 0.6% na lignin bɛyɛ 36.5%, a ɛboa ma ɛdan fango a ɛnyɛ den koraa. Coconut shell charcoal yɛ abɔdeɛ mu ne nneɛma a atwa yɛn ho ahyia a ɛnyɛ bɔne biofuel. Ɛyɛ pɛtro a eye sen biara a wɔde si nnua, kerosene, ne pɛtro afoforo a efi abo mu ananmu. Wɔ Mfinimfini Apuei te sɛ Saudi Arabia, Lebanon, ne Syria no, wɔde akutu fango birikisi di dwuma sɛ hookah fango (Shisha fango). Bere a ɛwɔ Europa no, wɔde yɛ BBQ (barbecue). Maste

Enti saa Farao yi de Israelfo no yɛɛ nkoa. Ɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wontwa blɔks a yɛde si dan, na wɔnyɛ adwumaden wɔ afuw mu. Gina Blay - Wɔakyerɛw nsɛm yi wɔ Akuapem kasa mu Gina Blay (Wɔ woo no October da a ɛtɔ so 9, afe 1956) yɛ Ghanani nsɛmkyerɛwfo ne ɔman ananmusifo ne amanyɔkuo New Partriotic Party no mu ni. ɔsom sɛ Ghana ananmusini a ɔwɔ Germany. Nhomasua[sesa] Gina Blay kɔɔ suapɔn a ne din de University of Ghana.. Adwuma[sesa] Gina Blay ne opanyin a ɔda adwumakuo a ne din de Western Publication Limeted a ɛyɛ atesɛm tintimbea. Atesɛm nkrataa a wotintim wɔ ho no din ne Daily Guide Kokoram Yareɛ[sesa] Ayaresafo huu wɔ ne ho sɛ w’anya nufoɔ mu kokoram yareɛ no bi wɔ afe 2008 mu ma wɔ saa no yareɛ ɔman ananmusifo adwuma[sesa] Wɔ July afe 2017 mu no, ɔmanpanyin Nana Akuffo-Addo paw Gina Blay se Ghana ananmusifo wo Germany. Na ɔka nnipa a wɔn dodoɔ yɛ aduonu mienu a wɔpaw wɔn sɛ wonkɔ som sɛ Ghana ananmusifo wɔ aman ahorɔw so N'asetena mu[sesa] Gina Blay yɛ ɔwarefo a ne Kunu din de Freddie Blay, amanyɔkuo New Partriotic party no titenani.

.:DԐN NA ԐSԐ SԐ MIHU ANSA MAGYE ASUBƆ SԐ YEHOWA ADANSENI? “Mene Yehowa Adansefo resua na misusuw sɛ nea wɔka no aba pii wom, nanso ansa na mɛgye asubɔ no, mepɛ sɛ mihu sɛ wɔne “Nokware no”. Dɛn na wowɔ ka fa wɔnho?” YԐN MMUAE: Damfo Ɔdɔfo, Ɔpɛ a wɔwɔ sɛ wobɛyɛ Yehowa Adansefo Som ho nhwehwɛmu anibere so ansa na wode woho adɔm wɔn no sɛ nkamfo. Ԑyɛ yɛn anigye sɛ yɛanya hokwan ne wo besusuw yɛn nhwehwɛmu a yɛaboaboa ano fa wɔnho no, na yɛgye di sɛ ɛbɛboa wo bere a wopɛ sɛ wohu sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wodɔm Ɔwɛn Aban Ahyehyɛde no anaa. Wɔ bere a Yehowa Adansefo ankorankoro yɛ nnipa pa no, yɛahu sɛ Ɔwɛn Aban Ahyehyɛde no Ankasa nyɛ nokwaredifo wɔ “nokware no” ho. Ԑnyɛ sɛ Yehowa Adansefo Bible no, Wiase Foforo Nkyerɛase (WFN) no na woakyinkyim no nko, na mmom wɔn amanne pii a wɔkyerɛ ne Kyerɛwnsɛm no nhyia. (Sɛ wopɛ nsɛm pii a hwɛ yɛn kyerɛwtohɔ “Nokwasɛm a Ɔwɛn Aban Asafo Mpɛ Sɛ Wohu”, kaseɛbɔ.) Continue reading “Dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ mihu ansa magye asubɔ sɛ Yehowa Adanseni?”

.:LB’S STORY – Sacrificing a college education to serve the Jehovah’s Witness religion, he struggled in life. LB asetena pa no sɛee denam Yehowa Adansefo no asɔre a wɔwoo no toom na wɔde tetee no. Sɛ aberantewa, Yehowa Adansefo kyerɛe no sɛ ɔrennyin mmɔ akwaakora a ɛno nti sukuu a ɛkɔ akyiri a ɔbɛkɔ no ho nhia no efisɛ ɛbɛma wɔde honam fam ahonde ayɛ ne botae wɔ wiase bɔne yi mu. Nanso harmagedon bɛba de Paradise asase foforo no bɛba afe 1975 mu. LB werɛhowee neho sɛ ɔde mfe 30 ama Ɔwɛn Aban Asafo atoro nkɔmhyɛ no. Anigyesɛm ne sɛ ohuui nokware ankasa no bere a ogyaw Ɔwɛn Aban atoro nyame hɔ kɔfae nokware Nyankopɔn no.

Nea Bible ka Bible ka sɛ Satan Ɔbonsam yɛ obi a ɔwɔ hɔ ankasa. Wayɛ sɛ otirimɔdenfo a ɔwɔ ahoɔden na ɔde yɛ “atoro nsɛnkyerɛnne ” de ‘daadaa ’ nkurɔfo ma wɔyɛ nea ɔpɛ. Bible ka sɛ, Ɔbonsam “kɔ so ara dan ne ho hann bɔfo. ” (2 Tesalonikafo 2:9, 10; 2 Korintofo 11:14) Sɛ yɛhwɛ nneɛma bɔne a Ɔbonsam yɛ a, ɛma yɛhu sɛ ampa ɔwɔ hɔ. Nanso, ɛnyɛ amanehunu nyinaa na ɛfiri Ɔbonsam. Adɛn nti na yɛreka saa? Onyankopɔn bɔɔ nnipa sɛ yɛn ankasa mpaw sɛ yɛbɛyɛ papa anaa bɔne. (Yosua 24:15) Sɛ yɛsi gyinae bɔne a, yɛnya so nsunsuanso bɔne.

- Wɔakyerɛw nsɛm yi wɔ Akuapem kasa mu Abrantie Emmanuel Kwesi Danso Arthur Junior (wɔwoo wɔ mumu du-awɔtwe), a yɛ sei nim no sɛ Kwesi Arthur, eyɛ Ghana dwontonyi a ofri Tema Ntɛm bra na nwomasua[sesa] Wɔwoo na yɛ titii Kwesi Arthur eyɔ Tema na ɔkɔɔ sukuu eyɔ Tema Senior High School. Ndwom adwumayɛ[sesa] Abrantie Kwesi Arthur hyɛ ase kɔdu adwumayɛ wɔ ndwomu abra otie dwontonyi a ye frɛ no Drake ndwom, "Thank Me Later" Eyɔ afe 2015, ɔ buei ndwom dawuru "Grind Day" fi ne debut EP, "Live from Nkrumah Krom(2017)". Kwesi Arthur a yɛ ndwom ni Ghana dwontofuo ti sɛ Sarkodie, Medikal, KiDi, Jason EL, R2Bees, B4bonah, M.anifest, Stonebwoy, Shatta Wale. Na ɔka ndwomtofuo a ye yi hɔn ma "Best International Act" wɔ 2018 BET Awards.

Joseph Henry Mensah (31 Ɔbɛsɛ 1928 – 12 Ayɛwoho 2018) yɛ Ghana amanyɛnyi na sikasɛm ho nyimdzefo. Wɔ nye mfiase nwomasua mu no, J. H. Mensah kɔɔ Achimota Sukuu. Ɔkɔɔ do kɔɔ Gold Coast Sukuupɔn (mprempren Ghana Sukuupɔn) ntsam wɔ afe 1948 na 1954. Afei ɔdze n’ani kyerɛɛ London Sukuupɔn na Stanford Sukuupɔn, faako a onyaa bachelor’s na master’s degree nyinara a na ɔwɔ sikasɛm ho nsusuwii tsitsir na mpuntuo. Wɔ afe 1954 mu no, Mensah bɛyɛɛ Nhwehwɛmufo wɔ Sikasɛm mu wɔ Ghana Suapɔn mu, dzibea a ɔdzi
..........
ɔ afe 2004 Ghana amansan abatow no mu. Wɔdze abatow 32,035 paw no wɔ abatow 53,972 a edzi mu nyinara mu. Na eyi nye abatow a ɔfata a wɔtowee nyinara mu 59.40% yɛ pɛ. Wɔpaw no dɛ Ɔtemmufo Samuel Adjei a ofi Ɔman Demokrasi mbrahyɛbagua no mu, Cubagee Raphael – ɔkannyifo a ɔdze nye ho, Ɔsɔfo Nana Adjei-Ntow – nso yɛ ɔkannyifo a ɔdze nye ho, Theophilus Kwame Chartey a ofi Convention People’s Party no mu, Awuah Philip a ofi Every Ghana Living Everywhere Party no mu na A. Nnipa a ɛwɔ Kumasi bɛyɛ ɔpepepem mmuebsa (3,000,000) Abakɔsɛm[edit] Kumase abakɔsɛem firi Asantehene Nana Osei Tutu a ɔdi Kan bere so. Abakɔsem kyerɛsɛ,ɛn Nana Osei Tutu adamfo bi a woferɛ no Kɔmfo Anokye so na, Kumaseman yɛɛ kese. Wɔkyere se Kɔmfo Anokye duaa dua mmienu wo baabi a ene yi yɛferɛ no Kumase yi ene baabi a ene wɔfre no Kumawu. Dua no a woduaa no Kumawu no wuui maa ɛkaa Kumase dua no. Ɛno na ɛbo

Osagyefo Dr. Kwame Nkrumah bere so na wo sii sukuu kesee yi. Saa sukuu pon yi atere ama sukuu nketewaa bebree nso hyehye mu. Ebi ne School of Medical Sciences, School of Engineering ne School of Agriculture. Sukuu akesee bi nsoso ne sukuu pon a ede University of Education, Kumasi Campus, ene mmiensa bi a ennye aban dea te se KNUST. Woyram Boakye-Danquah yɛ ɔhwɛfoɛ ne kane Manpanyin ananmusifo a ɔwɔ South Dai mansin a ɛwɔ Frao Mantam mo wɔ Ghana. Boachie-Danquah ayɛ adwuma sɛ ɔhwɛfo wo nnwuma pii mu ansa na ɔde ne kɔhyɛɛ amanyɔsɛm mu. Manpanyin John Kuffour paw no wɔ afe 2005 mu sɛ manpanyin ananmusifo a ɔwɔ Dayi South Mansin no mu. Okuraa saa dibea no kosii bre a Kofour aban no baa n’awaie wɔ abatoɔ a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ afe 2008 no akyi. Manpanyin Mills de Kafui Bekui a ɔyɛ nsumnam mu nimdeɛfo no sii n’anan mu wɔ afe 2009.

Nkɔkɔɔ Nkawkaw Nkɔkɔɔ ye kro kesee a ewo Nkran ne Kumasi entem. Nipa beye mpem aduanan nwontwe na ewo Nkawkaw (48.000) Yefre won Kwahu foo. Nkɔkɔɔ kyere kɔɔ, kɔɔ. Enipa no pii efri ɔbɔmeng. Nipa beberee a won firi Nkawkaw ye adwadifoo kesee.Won mu bebree te nkran .Won wo sika paa nti won asisi adan fefeefe wo Nkɔkɔɔ ne nkuro a atwa won ho ahyia (nkuro te se Oboo anaa Obomneg). Eho ye fe paa. Afe biara Kwahufo ko Nkawkaw ne Kwahu mantem nyinaa kodi Yesu Wusoree (Easter). Nkawkaw ka Kwahufoo kuro pon no ho. Sukuu atitire baako a ewo ho ne Nkawkaw Mpanimfoo Nko animu Sukuu (Nkawkaw Senior High School). Ayaresabea nsoso wo ho.

HWƐ Kain ne Habel. Wɔayɛ mpanyimfo. Kain abɛyɛ okuafo. Oduadua awi, nnuaba ne afum nneɛma ahorow. Na Habel abɛyɛ obi a ɔhwɛ nguan. Na ɔpɛ nguamma asɛm. Wonyin bɛyɛɛ nguan akɛse, enti ankyɛ na Habel benyaa nguan pii a ɔhwɛ wɔn. Da koro Kain ne Habel de akyɛde brɛɛ Onyankopɔn. Kain de n’afum nnuan no bi bae. Na Habel de oguan a wadɔ sen biara a ɔwɔ no bae. Yehowa ani gyee Habel ne n’akyɛde no ho. Nanso n’ani annye Kain ne n’akyɛde no ho. Wunim nea enti? Ɛnyɛ sɛ ebia na Habel akyɛde no ye sen Kain

Adam ne Hawa mmabarima ne mmabea afoforo nso fii ase warewaree, na wɔn nso wowoo mma. Ankyɛ na nnipa bɛyɛɛ pii wɔ asase so. Momma yensua ebinom ho asɛm. Susuw ho hwɛ: Nea ɛbɛyɛ na ananse atumi asusuw baabi a ogyina ne baabi a ɔpɛ sɛ ohuruw si pɛpɛɛpɛ no, ɔde n’aniwa akɛse abien a emu biara kesua no fomfam so anan no na ɛyɛ adwuma. Bere a n’ani kesua a ɛfomfam so no biako tumi hu hann yiye no, biako a ɛso yɛ wusii no ntumi nhu ade yiye. Sɛ enhu biribi yiye a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ dekode no bɛn no paa. Baebolo Ne Bua Kɛ Baebolo ne bua kɛ kyɛkyɛ! Amaneɛnwunlɛ ɛmboka Nyamenle adwenle mɔɔ ɔlɛ ye wɔ alesama anwo la anwo. Noko, mekɛ mɔɔ menli nwiɔ mɔɔ bɛlimoale bɛbɔle bɛ la kpole Nyamenle tumililɛ la bɛhilele kɛ bɛdabɛ a bɛbazi mɔɔ le kpalɛ nee ɛtane la anwo kpɔkɛ a. Bɛandie Nyamenle na ɛhye maanle bɛnwunle amaneɛ. Bɛ kpɔkɛ ɛtane ne anwo amaneɛ a yɛlɛnwu ye ɛnɛ a. Yemɔti tɛ Nyamenle a vale amaneɛnwunlɛ rale. Baebolo ne ka kɛ: “Saa awie kɔ ngyegyelɛ nu a ɔmmaka kɛ, ‘Nyamenle ɛlɛsɔ me anlea.’ Ɔluakɛ ɛtane ɛngola ɛnzɔ Nyamenle ɛnnea yɛɛ Nyamenle mumua ne ɛnzɔ awie biala ɛnnea.” (Gyemise 1:13) Awie biala kola nwu amaneɛ—bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kulo bɛ la bɔbɔ.

Mebɛyɛ dɛn enya enyigye wɔ asetsena mu? Nsɛm a nkorɔfo taa bisa fa hɛn Bible adzesũa ho nhyehyɛɛ no ho mbuae ahorow na odzidzi do yi. Ɔkwan bɛn do na wɔyɛ adzesũa no? ..........
a nnda nwoma no a wɔdze sũa adze no so do. Adzesũa no gye ber tsentsen ahen? Nyimpa pii yi bɛyɛ dɔnhwer kor si hɔ dapɛn biara nye hɛn sũa Bible no. Naaso yennyi mber tsentsen pɔtsẽe bi a yɛnye obi sũa adze. Wo nhyehyɛɛ anaa w’adagyer na ɔbɛkyerɛ mber tsentsen a yɛnye wo bosũa adze. Sɛ mekã dɛ wɔnye me mbosũa Bible no a, ebɛn asɛm besi? Mishenin Art studio no mfoniniyɛfo no twetwe mfonini biara sɛnea wɔpɛ: ma nneɛma a wɔatintim (a nhoma ka ho), wɛbsaet ahorow, ne sini ahorow. Yɛs. Ɛnibɔdi we na Jiova Witnɛs, na pɔsin we de prich—ivin di uman dɛn. Dɛn bin rayt na di Baybul se “bɔku [“uman dɛn,” NW] kin kɛr di nyuz go.”—Sam 68:11. Uman dɛn we na Jiova Witnɛs dɛn de falamakata di gud uman dɛn we di Baybul bin tɔk bɔt. (Prɔvabs 31:10-31) Pan ɔl we dɛn nɔ kin de bifo na di kɔngrigeshɔn, dɛnsɛf kin jɔyn pan di prichin wok. Apat frɔm dat, dɛn de tich dɛn pikin bɔt di advays dɛn na di Baybul. (Prɔvabs 1:8) Uman dɛn we na Jiova Witnɛs dɛn kin ɛp ɔda pipul dɛn fɔ du gud bay wetin dɛn de tɔk ɛn wetin dɛn de du.—Taytɔs 2:3-5.

Nsɛm a Akenkanfo Bisa So Onyankopɔn Ahenni Wɔ Wo Komam? Nnipa pii gye di sɛ asɛmmisa yi ho mmuae yɛ yiw. Sɛ nhwɛso no, The Catholic Encyclopedia ka sɛ: “Onyankopɔn ahenni kyerɛ sɛ . . . Onyankopɔn na odi yɛn koma so.” Asɔfo taa kyerɛkyerɛ saa. So Bible kyerɛkyerɛ ankasa sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni wɔ nnipa komam? Ebinom susuw sɛ Yesu ankasa na odii kan hyɛɛ adwene a ɛne sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni wɔ nnipa komam no ho nkuran. Ɛyɛ ampa sɛ Yesu kae sɛ: “Onyankopɔn ahenni no wɔ mo mfinimfini.” (Luka 17:21) Bible
..........
no afi baabi a ɛte saa aba? Nokwasɛm ne sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni ntumi mfi onipa komam mma sɛnea nsɔe ntumi nsow borɔdɔma no ara pɛ.—Mateo 7:16. Nea ɛto so abien no, susuw nnipa a na Yesu rekasa akyerɛ wɔn bere a ɔkaa asɛm a ɛwɔ Luka 17:21 no ho hwɛ. Nkyekyɛm a edi eyi anim no kenkan sɛ: “Bere a Farisifo no bisaa no bere a Onyankopɔn ahenni bɛba no, obuaa wɔn.” (Luka 17:20) Ná Farisifo no yɛ Yesu atamfo. Yesu kae sɛ na saa nyaatwomfo no renkɔ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no mu. (Mateo 23:13) Enti sɛ na saa Far

Enti berɛ bi bɛba a wiase nyinaa bɛnya aban baako? Sɛ aban baako na ɛdi wiase nyinaa so a, hwɛ sɛnea anka nnipa bɛnya ahotɔ. Ɛnnɛ ebinom di yie paa, nanso nnipa pii na ohia nti, wɔrehunu amane. Nanso aban a ɛdwene ne manfoɔ ho deɛ, ɛbɛtumi ama obiara nsa aka nea ɔhia. Wohwɛ a nnipa bɛtumi de aban a ɛte saa aba asase so? Ɛfiri tete nyinaa, nnipa aban adi nkoguo. Wɔntumi mmaa wɔn a wɔdi wɔn so no nsa nkaa nea wɔhia; wɔn a wɔn ho taa ka mu paa ne ahiafoɔ. Aban no bi di atirimɔdensɛm. (Ɔsɛnkafoɔ 4:1
..........

Elizabeth Afoley Quaye (wɔwoo no afe 1970), mprempren ɔyɛ Mmarahyɛbadwa no mu ni ma Krowor mmansini a ɛwɔ Nkran punpuni (Greater Accra ) mantam mu wɔ Ghana no. Ɔsan nso yɛ ɔsoafoɔ a ɔhwɛ Mpataayie, afarefodwuma, ne Nsuo mu Nneɛma ho nsɛm so.[1] Elizabeth wɔ Bachelor of Science abɔdin krataa wɔ (Agribusiness) mu wɔ Central University College. Ɔnyaa (National Diploma )wɔ (General Agriculture) mu wɔ Ghana Suapɔn mu, na ɔsan nso nyaa adansedie krataa wɔ General Agriculture mu wɔ Kwadaso Agricultural
..........
n ne aduosia nsia (32,463) wɔ mpem aduosia mmeɛnsa, ahanum ne aduonum-num (63,555) a wɔtoeɛ no mu, a ɛgyina hɔ ma ɔha nkyekyem aduonum-baako ne akyiri pɔ whee ne nwɔtwe (51.08).[4] Elizabeth na ɔyɛ asoeɛ a ɛhweɛ kuadwuma ne nnuane so (Ministry of Food and Agriculture) no mu panin a ɔhwɛ nnɔbaeɛ dua so. Wadi saa dwuma yi bɛyɛ mfeɛ aduonu ni. Elizabeth Afoley Quaye a ɔyɛ Mmarahyɛbadwa no mu ni ma Krowor mansini no ani ku kwadwuma ho pa ara. Nti mpɛn pii no, ɔhyɛ ɔmanfoɔ nkuran sɛ wɔmfa wɔn ho nhyɛ

但以理夢見四獸 1巴比倫王伯沙撒元年,但以理在床上做了一個夢,腦中出現了異象,便把夢記錄下來,講述其中的大意. 2但以理說:「我在夜間的異象中看見天風四面吹來,攪動大海. 3接著,四隻巨獸從海中上來,各有不同的形狀. 4第一隻獸像獅子,但有鷹的翅膀.我觀看時,見牠的翅膀被拔掉.牠被扶起來,像人一樣雙腳站在地上,並被賦予人的頭腦. 5第二隻獸像熊,用兩隻後腿站立,牙齒間叼著三根肋骨,有聲音對牠說,『起來,多吞吃肉吧!』 6「此後,我繼續觀看,見還有一隻獸像豹,背上有四個如鳥翼般的翅膀.這獸有四個頭,並被賦予權柄. 7此後,我在夜間的異象中看見第四隻獸,恐怖可怕,極其強壯,用大鐵牙吞吃,咬碎獵物,用腳踐踏所剩的.這獸與前三隻獸不同,牠有十個角. 8我觀看這些角時,見其中長出一個小角,先前的角中有三個被連根拔出,讓它取而代之.這小角有人的眼睛和說狂言的口. 9「我看見寶座已設立, 上面坐著亙古長存者, 祂的衣服潔白如雪, 頭髮如純淨的羊毛. 祂的寶座是火焰, 寶座的輪子是烈火. 10從祂面前流出火河, 事奉祂的有千千, 侍立在祂面前的有萬萬. 祂坐下要審判, 案卷已經展開. 11「我繼續觀看

Yehowa Adansefo a wɔwɔ hɔ nnɛ no, wɔn som no fii ase bɛboro mfe 130 ni. Mfiase no, Bible asuafo kakraa bi a na wɔte Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania wɔ United States tɔɔ wɔn bo yɛɛ Bible mu nhwehwɛmu kɔɔ akyiri. Wɔde nneɛma a na asɔre ahorow kyerɛkyerɛ no totoo nea Bible kyerɛkyerɛ ankasa ho. Afei nea wosuae no, wofii ase de bi kɔɔ nhoma ne atesɛm nkrataa mu, na wɔde bi nso yɛɛ nhoma a wɔato din Ɔwɛn-Aban—Ɛka Yehowa Ahenni Kyerɛ. Bible asuafo anokwafo yi mu biako ne ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Charles Taze Russell. Bible adesua a na wɔreyɛ no, Russell na na odi wɔn anim; ɔno ara nso na odii anim ma wɔyɛɛ Ɔwɛn-Aban no, nanso ɛnyɛ sɛ na wakɔfa ɔsom foforo aba. Saa bere no, na wɔfrɛ wɔn Bible Asuafo; nea na esi Russell ne wɔn a aka no ani so ne sɛ wɔbɛboa nkurɔfo ama wɔahu Yesu Kristo nkyerɛkyerɛ. Afei nso na wɔpɛ sɛ wodi Kristofo a wɔtenaa ase asomafo no bere so no anammɔn akyi. Yesu Kristo na ɔde Kristosom bae, enti yebu no sɛ ɔno na ɔde yɛn som no bae.—Kolosefo 1:18-20.

Anidaso bɛn na ɛwɔ hɔ ma nnipa? Nnipa bɛkɔ so ara anya nkɔanim wɔ nyansahu mu. Nanso, wohwɛ a bere bi bɛba a nnipa bɛtumi ama adesamma atena asomdwoe mu a obiara dwen ne yɔnko ho? Dabida. Ɛnnɛ, pɛsɛmenkominya ne adifudepɛ abu so wɔ wiase baabiara. Nanso, Onyankopɔn ahyɛ bɔ sɛ ɔbɛma nnipa anya asetena pa daakye. Onyankopɔn Asɛm ka sɛ, bere bi bɛba a nnipa nyinaa bɛdodɔ wɔn ho. Ehu renka obiara, na obiara nso renteetee ne yɔnko wɔ hɔ. Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na pɛsɛmenkominya afi hɔ? Onyankopɔn bɔɔ onipa no, wamfa pɛsɛmenkominya anhyɛ ne mu. Nanso bere a onipa a ɔdi kan no hyɛɛ da yɛɛ Onyankopɔn so asoɔden no, ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔbɔnefo. Enti ɔno na ɔde pɛsɛmenkominya woo yɛn. Nanso anigyesɛm ne sɛ, Onyankopɔn nam Yesu so bɛma nnipa asan ayɛ pɛ a bɔne biara nni wɔn ho. Onyankopɔn maa Yesu bɛwu gyee yɛn nkwa. Enti bɔne a yɛn nana a ɔdi kan no yɛe no renni yɛn so tumi bio. (Romafoɔ 5:19) Yesu wuo no ama nnipa anya daakye ho anidaso a ɛyɛ anigye. Saa bere no, nnipa renyɛ pɛsɛmenkominya na wɔrenyɛ bɔne nso bio.

Akyem Sɔhwɛ hene ne ne mpanyimfo de nhyehyɛe a ɛfa 2019 Ohum afahyɛ ho no ato gua ama ne manfo. Nana ne n’atrankogua hyiam nnera, Kitawonsa 1, 2019 wɔ kurow no ahemfi. Bere a wɔhyiae no Nana maa ne mpanyimfo aso tee sɛ Ohum afahyɛ yɛ amammere ne amanne a ne nenanom de gyaa no. Na ne saa no nti ɛwɔ sɛ ɔtoa so na nkyirimma nso ahu nea ɛyɛe a kurow no bae ne mpanyimfo a wɔkyekyeree kurow no.Nhyiam no ase no, Nana too ne nsa de frɛɛ mmabun no mu kandifo no sɛ ommetie nea ɛrekɔso na ɔmma ne mfɛfo no aso nte. Nsɛmkyerɛwfo nso Nana angyaw wɔn mu.Nana de too gua se wɔde nnawɔtwe na asi hɔ sɛ wɔde rebɛhyɛ Ohum no sɛnea wɔyɛ no afe biara no. Mmom, wɔde taboɔ ato dedeyɛ so nnanso wɔ ne kurow no mu.

Gifty Eugenia Kusi (nee Kwofie) (wɔwoo no wɔ Kwakwar 11,1958) ɔyɛ Ghana amanyɛnyi .Nna ɔyɛ kuw ba wɔ mbrahyɛbagua fie a ɔtɔ do anan wɔ Fourth Republic wɔ Ghana wɔ Tarkwa-Nsuaem (Ghana parliament constituency) fitsi 2001 kesi 2017. Ɔsan so yɛ nhwehwɛmu boafo tsitsir wɔ community Health wɔ Ghana Suapɔn (University of Ghana Medical School - Korle-Bu). Kusi (nee Kwofie) fir Nsuaem-Tarkwa wɔ Anee Mantɔw mu wɔ Ghana. Kusi kitsa abɔdzin krataa a ɔyɛ Master of Philosophy degree wɔ Sociology wɔ Ghana Sua
..........
bien na kor(2001) mu, ber a ogyinae na odzii nkonyim na ɔbɛyɛɛ mbrahyɛbaguanyi wɔ Tarkwa-Nsuaem abatow mpasua do. Ɔtsenaa egua no do mfe du-esia(16), a ɔmaa ɔbɛyɛɛ kuw ba wɔ mbrahyɛbagua fie a ɔtɔ do ebiasa, anan, enum na esia mu wɔ 4th Republic wɔ Ghana. Ɔyɛ NPP "Disciplinary committee nyi, Ghana Business committee, Ghana mbrahyɛbagua mu asɔe a ɔhwɛ Gender na mbofra do, na Ghana committee wɔ apomudzen ho ( Parliament of Ghana committee on Health ɔyɛ Ɔsoafo abedzi ekyir wɔ Anee Mantɔw mu. Atirimɔdenfo pɛ sɛ wokum me; wɔn a wonsuro Onyankopɔn. 4 Nanso Onyankopɔn ne me boafo. Awurade ne me hwɛfo. 5 Awurade nnyina m’atamfo bɔne so ntwe wɔn aso. SƐNEA WOBƐYƐ NO: - Siesie wo ho yiye. Dwen ho hwɛ nea enti a wɔkyerɛw saa asɛm no. Sua sɛ wobɛka nsɛmfua dodow bi abom akan ne nyinaa, sen sɛ wobɛbobɔ nsɛmfua no din mmaako mmaako. Hwɛ sɛ woremfa nsɛmfua bi nhyehyɛ mu, woremmɔ bi ntra, anaa woremfa asɛmfua bi nhyɛ foforo ananmu. Fa kasa mu agyiraehyɛde a ɛwɔ akenkan no mu nyinaa di dwuma. - Bɔ asɛmfua biara din yiye. Sɛ wunnim sɛnea wɔbɔ asɛmfua bi a, hwɛ nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma bi mu. Wubetumi nso abɔ akenkan no a wɔakyere agu afiri so atie, anaa wubetumi abisa obi a onim akenkan yiye ama waboa wo. - Kasa ma emu nna hɔ. Ɛyɛ a ma wo ti so, bue w’ano yiye, na tɔ wo bo ase bobɔ nsɛmfua din kama. Bɔ mmɔden kenkan ma nsɛmfua no mpue yiye.
